name: claude-code-sandbox
initializeCommand: mkdir -p .devcontainer/.claude-auth .claude-plugins .gh-config && cp ~/.claude/settings.json ~/.claude/.credentials.json .devcontainer/.claude-auth/ 2>/dev/null || true && cp ~/.claude.json .devcontainer/.claude-auth/claude.json 2>/dev/null || true && cp -n ~/.claude/plugins/known_marketplaces.json ~/.claude/plugins/installed_plugins.json .claude-plugins/ 2>/dev/null || true && cp -r ~/.config/gh/* .gh-config/ 2>/dev/null || true
postCreateCommand: claude --version && docker --version && gh --version && echo 'âœ… Claude Code + Docker + GitHub CLI ready'
